title: Installation issue: NAMD with MPI
body:
Hi,
I would like to build NAMD with MPI support.

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git

$ cat >spack/etc/spack/defaults/compilers.yaml <<EOL
compilers:
- compiler:
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    target: x86_64
    operating_system: centos7
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    paths:
      cc:  /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/gcc
      cxx: /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/g++
      f77: /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/gfortran
      fc:  /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/gfortran
EOL

$ cat >>spack/etc/spack/defaults/packages.yaml <<EOL

  openmpi:
    externals:
    - spec: "openmpi @4.0.3 %gcc@9.2.0"
      prefix: /opt/openmpi-4.0.3/
    buildable: False

  intel-mpi:
    externals:
    - spec: "intel-mpi @2019.7.217"
      prefix: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2020.1.217/linux/mpi
    buildable: False

  intel-mkl:
    externals:
    - spec: "intel-mkl @2019.5.281 threads=openmp"
      prefix: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2019.5.281/linux/mkl
    buildable: False
EOL

$ source spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack install namd ^charmpp backend=mpi ^openmpi
...
<built-in>: note: built-in 'strncmp' declared here
chmod: cannot access '/home/vasco/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-zen/gcc-9.2.0/charmpp-6.10.2-gq7vrz5ydfhg2oedstxyuvgjjqaj26dd/bin/../include/MPIOPTS': No such file or directory
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
make: *** [inc/ComputeMoaMgr.decl.h] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
make: *** [inc/ComputeMgr.decl.h] Error 1
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
make: *** [inc/Node.decl.h] Error 1
make: *** [inc/PatchMgr.decl.h] Error 1
make: *** [inc/WorkDistrib.decl.h] Error 1
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
make: *** [inc/ComputeFmmSerialMgr.decl.h] Error 1
make: *** [inc/ComputeMsmSerialMgr.decl.h] Error 1
Error> charmc can not call AMPI's mpicxx/mpiCC wrapper! Please fix your PATH.
make: *** [inc/ComputeMsmMgr.decl.h] Error 1
```
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5182596/spack-build-out.txt)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5182597/spack-build-env.txt)
